Package eu.mihosoft.freerouting.board

Class Components

java.lang.Object
eu.mihosoft.freerouting.board.Components
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Components extends Object implements Serializable
Contains the lists of components on the board.

  • Constructor Details

    • Components

      public Components()

  • Method Details

    • add

      public Component add(String p_name, Point p_location, double p_rotation_in_degree, boolean p_on_front, Package p_package_front, Package p_package_back, boolean p_position_fixed)
      Inserts a component into the list. The items of the component have to be inserted separately into the board. If p_on_front is false, the component will be placed on the back side, and p_package_back is used instead of p_package_front.

    • add

      public Component add(Point p_location, double p_rotation, boolean p_on_front, Package p_package)
      Adds a component to this object. The items of the component have to be inserted separately into the board. If p_on_front is false, the component will be placed on the back side. The component name is generated internally.

    • get

      public Component get(String p_name)
      Returns the component with the input name or null, if no such component exists.

    • get

      public Component get(int p_component_no)
      Returns the component with the input component number or null, if no such component exists. Component numbers are from 1 to component count

    • count

      public int count()
      Returns the number of components on the board.

    • generate_snapshot

      public void generate_snapshot()
      Generates a snapshot for the undo algorithm.

    • undo

      public boolean undo(BoardObservers p_observers)
      Restores the sitiation at the previous snapshot. Returns false, if no more undo is possible.

    • redo

      public boolean redo(BoardObservers p_observers)
      Restores the sitiation before the last undo. Returns false, if no more redo is possible.

    • move

      public void move(int p_component_no, Vector p_vector)
      Moves the component with number p_component_no. Works contrary to Component.translate_by with the undo algorithm of the board.

    • turn_90_degree

      public void turn_90_degree(int p_component_no, int p_factor, IntPoint p_pole)
      Turns the component with number p_component_no by p_factor times 90 degree around p_pole. Works contrary to Component.turn_90_degree with the undo algorithm of the board.

    • rotate

      public void rotate(int p_component_no, double p_rotation_in_degree, IntPoint p_pole)
      Rotates the component with number p_component_no by p_rotation_in_degree around p_pole. Works contrary to Component.rotate with the undo algorithm of the board.

    • change_side

      public void change_side(int p_component_no, IntPoint p_pole)
      Changes the placement side of the component the component with number p_component_no and mirrors it at the vertical line through p_pole. Works contrary to Component.change_side the undo algorithm of the board.

    • set_flip_style_rotate_first

      public void set_flip_style_rotate_first(boolean p_value)
      If true, components on the back side are rotated before mirroring, else they are mirrored before rotating.

    • get_flip_style_rotate_first

      public boolean get_flip_style_rotate_first()
      If true, components on the back side are rotated before mirroring, else they are mirrored before rotating.
